name: Assignment06 NavMesh
description:
This assignment has 3 enemies. 

1 will come toward you normally.

1 (the purple one) will speed up after coming 10 meters within range of you.

1 will shoot at you, but will stop moving after getting 15 meters within range of you. 

You can shoot the enemies and kill them, and the enemies will hurt you if you run into them. Some enemies can also shoot you and hurt you. 

If you run out of health or time, the game restarts and you lose.
